generator.group: The Florey Institute of Neuroscience and Mental Health

contact.group: The Florey Institute of Neuroscience and Mental Health, University of Melbourne
The Florey Institute of Neuroscience and Mental Health, University of Melbourne

publications.title: An iPSC line (FINi003-A) from a male with late-onset developmental and epileptic encephalopathy caused by a heterozygous p.E1211K variant in the SCN2A gene encoding the voltage-gated sodium channel Na(v)1.2

donor.disease_description: Male donor carrying a heterozygous p.E1211K variant in SCN2A (NaV1.2)

genomic_modifications.description: Heterozygous missense variant p.E1211K in SCN2A (NaV1.2)

genomic_characterisation.summary: Genome-wide SNP array (Illumina Global Screening Array) showed no detectable chromosomal copy number changes or loss of heterozygosity; normal profile.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: ReproRNA Kit (StemCell Technologies); polycistronic mRNA expressing KLF4, POU5F1/OCT4, SOX2, GLIS1, c-MYC

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Melbourne Human Research Ethics Committee
